## Load packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
#| code-fold: true
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read data

```{r}
clim_data <- read.table(here("data", "clim.txt"), header = TRUE)
```

## Source function

```{r}
source(here("almond_yield_model.R"))

```

## Use function

```{r}
almond_yield_profit(clim_data)
```
